Facecam AI for Chrome offers real-time face and voice customization for all your online video interactions, whether you're in virtual meetings, online classes, or video chats.

With advanced AI-powered face modification and voice alteration capabilities, Facecam AI helps you present yourself exactly how you want across any web-based video platform. Transform your appearance and voice instantly while maintaining natural-looking results and clear audio quality.

➤ How it works
Facecam AI processes your video and audio feeds in real-time, applying your chosen modifications instantly. Select from preset filters or create custom adjustments for both visual and audio elements. Changes appear seamlessly in your video feed without any additional setup required.

➤ Key Features
• Real-time face modifications
• Voice alteration with multiple preset options
• Custom face and voice filter creation
• Background blur and replacement
• Low latency processing for smooth video calls
• Automatic detection and tracking

➤ Works across platforms
Use FaceCam AI seamlessly across popular video platforms:
• Google Meet
• Zoom (web version)
• Microsoft Teams (web version)
• Discord
• And more!

➤ What's included?

~ Free
• Basic face filters
• Simple voice modifications
• Background blur
• Standard video quality

~ Premium
• Advanced face modification options
• Professional voice alteration tools
• Custom filter creation
• HD video quality
• Background replacement
• Priority processing

➤ Privacy First
FaceCam AI processes all modifications locally on your device, ensuring your video and audio data never leaves your computer. No data is stored or transmitted to external servers.

➤ System Requirements
• Chrome browser version 88 or higher
• Webcam access
• Microphone access
• 4GB RAM minimum
• Intel i5/AMD Ryzen 5 or better recommended

➤ Get Started
Install FaceCam AI and transform your online video presence today. Simple setup gets you started in minutes with no technical expertise required.

➤ Terms and Conditions
By installing the extension, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy. Visit www.facecamai.com/terms and www.facecamai.com/privacy for more information.
